titleStmt.title: Muggleton's last will & testament (who died Novemb. 30, 1679) being an absolute and real recantation of his former notorious blasphemous doctrine : together with several Christian instructions in order to refrain the same, shewing the eternal woe
titleStmt.author: Muggleton, Lodowick, 1609-1698.
J. B.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
